MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-NOV-2020 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL16 and LL22 postcode areas of Denbigh and Abergele, affecting properties in a widespread area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:45AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:55PM on 8th November 2020
